title: Anyone else lagging on Tlstra right now in Sydney?
body:
Not sure if this is a problem with my connection, Telstra, our servers or the incoming storm...
Anyone else?

replies.body:
It was me at the end...
The "last mile" of Telstra is not properly insulated so every time it rains, the line gets unstable...

> It was me at the end...
> The "last mile" of Telstra is not properly insulated so every time it rains, the line gets unstable...

Haha Tesltra wont even dig our line in, the bas%%%%s. Part of their contract was to dig the line they replaced and they just left it above ground. Doesnt help that Tesltra owns the exchange and only installs copper wiring for our whole town. They reckon i should be getting 11mbp/s but i cant even get 1% of that, 150kbp/s max download sure is great.
i am having spikes and im from sydney northern shore

That moment when a Rioter is making a lag thread!

QUICK TO THE LOSS PREVENTED-MOBILE BATMAN!
I'm from Sydney using Telstra as well but i'm fine :)
I had issues yesterday in Brisbane during the storms and had a teammate completely DC. I'm with iinet but they use telstra network infrastructure anyway.
Brisbane Telstra here. My connection is fine to the servers. It may be localised within NSW.
